00034 Entity* Entity_manager::Create_entity(Map* map)
00035 {
00036         Entity* entity = new Entity(map);
00037         entity->Set_game(game);
00038 
00039         map->Add_entity(entity);
00040         contained_entities[entity] = map;
00041 
00042         game->Get_lua_wrapper().Call("Initialize_entity", entity);
00043 
00044         return entity;
00045 }
00046 
00047 
00048 void Entity_manager::Destroy_entity(Entity* entity)
00049 {
00050         mon_assert(entity);
00051         contained_entities[entity]->Remove_entity(entity);
00052         contained_entities.erase(entity);
00053         game->Get_obstacle_manager().Remove_obstacle(entity);
00054         delete entity;
00055 }
00056 
00057 
00058 void Entity_manager::Update(double dt)
00059 {
00060         for(Contained_entities::iterator i = contained_entities.begin(); i!=contained_entities.end(); ++i)
00061         {
00062                 if(i->first->Destroyed())
00063                 {
00064                         delete i->first;
00065                         contained_entities.erase(i);
00066                 }
00067                 else
00068                 {
00069                         i->first->Update(dt);
00070                 }
00071         }
00072 }
00073 
00074 
00075 void Entity_manager::Transfer_entity(Entity* entity, Container* to)
00076 {
00077         mon_assert(entity && to);
00078         contained_entities[entity]->Remove_entity(entity);
00079         to->Add_entity(entity);
00080         contained_entities[entity] = to;
00081 }
00082 
00083 
00084 void Entity_manager::Assert_entity(Entity* entity)
00085 {
00086         mon_assert(entity == player || contained_entities.find(entity) != contained_entities.end());
00087 }

00101 
00102 int Destroy_entity(lua_State* state)
00103 {
00104         Game* game = Lua_wrapper::Get_game(state);
00105         Entity_manager& manager = game->Get_entity_manager();
00106         Entity* entity = static_cast<Entity*>(lua_touserdata(state, 1));
00107         manager.Destroy_entity(entity);
00108         return 0;
00109 }
00110 
00111 
00112 int Create_entity(lua_State* state)
00113 {
00114         Game* game = Lua_wrapper::Get_game(state);
00115         Entity_manager& manager = game->Get_entity_manager();
00116         Map* map = static_cast<Map*>(lua_touserdata(state, 1));
00117         manager.Assert_container(map);
00118         lua_pushlightuserdata(state, manager.Create_entity(map));
00119         return 1;
00120 }
00121 
00122 
00123 int Transfer_entity(lua_State* state)
00124 {
00125         Game* game = Lua_wrapper::Get_game(state);
00126         Entity_manager& manager = game->Get_entity_manager();
00127 
00128         Entity* entity = static_cast<Entity*>(lua_touserdata(state, 1));
00129         manager.Assert_entity(entity);
00130         Map* to = static_cast<Map*>(lua_touserdata(state, 2));
00131         manager.Assert_container(to);
00132 
00133         manager.Transfer_entity(entity, to);
00134         return 0;
00135 }
00136 /*
00137 int Get_entity_manager(lua_State* state)
00138 {
00139         Game* game = Lua_wrapper::Get_game(state);
00140         Entity_manager& manager = game->Get_entity_manager();
00141         lua_pushlightuserdata(state, &manager);
00142         return 1;
00143 }
00144 */
00145 void Entity_manager_register_lua_callbacks(lua_State* state)
00146 {
00147         lua_register(state, "Create_entity", Create_entity);
00148         lua_register(state, "Destroy_entity", Destroy_entity);
00149         lua_register(state, "Transfer_entity", Transfer_entity);
00150         //Obsolete
00151 //      lua_register(state, "Get_entity_manager", Get_entity_manager);
00152 }
